quick_answer.text: 100 g of steamed broccoli provides about 35 kcal, 3 g protein, and 3 g fiber.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 cup of steamed broccoli?
faqs.a: About 55 kcal for 1 cup (156 g) of steamed broccoli.

faqs.q: Is steamed broccoli low in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, 100 g has 7.1 g carbs, with 3 g fiber making it low net carbs.

faqs.q: What's the protein in steamed broccoli?
faqs.a: Around 2.8 g protein per 100 g, a good plant-based source.
